name: PKPaymentError
desc: An error type that you create to indicate problems with address or contact information on an Apple Pay sheet.

items.name: init(Code, userInfo: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates a payment error object of the specified type with the specified user information.

items.name: var code: Code
items.desc: The error code for this instance.

items.name: var errorCode: Int
items.desc: The error code for this instance.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A user-facing, localized string that describes the error.

items.name: static var billingContactInvalidError: PKPaymentError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate an invalid billing address or billing name.

items.name: static var shippingContactInvalidError: PKPaymentError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate an invalid shipping address, email, phone, or name.

items.name: static var shippingAddressUnserviceableError: PKPaymentError.Code
items.desc: The error code for an unserviceable shipping address.

items.name: static var couponCodeExpiredError: PKPaymentError.Code
items.desc: The error code that indicates an expired coupon.

items.name: static var couponCodeInvalidError: PKPaymentError.Code
items.desc: The error code that indicates an invalid coupon.

items.name: static var unknownError: PKPaymentError.Code
items.desc: The error code for an unknown error.

items.name: enum PKPaymentError.Code
items.desc: An error code that you provide to indicate problems with address or contact information on an Apple Pay sheet.

items.name: static var errorDomain: String
items.desc: The error domain for this error.

items.name: let PKPaymentErrorDomain: String
items.desc: The error domain for specific errors associated with Apple Pay in-app or web payments.

items.name: static func == (PKPaymentError, PKPaymentError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two payment error objects are equal.

items.name: static func != (PKPaymentError, PKPaymentError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two payment error objects arenâ€™t equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the payment error object by feeding the item into the given hasher.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value for the payment error.
